title: GALAXIA (Android Wear)
summary: GALAXIA -  the space arcade game for Android Wear!
description: GALAXIA -  the space arcade game for Android Wear! Use your wrist to control the game!After successfully defeated the aliens on the moon, you are now going to face the complete alien fleets in space! GAME DESCRIPTION• Tap to move the spaceship and fire, or control with the wrist!• Tap on TAP/WRIST CONTROL in title screen to select control mode.• Spaceship can takes 2 extra hits before destroyed.• Some aliens can take 1 or 2 extra hits before destroyed.• Enjoy sound effects on Huawei Watch and other watches with speakers!
descriptionHTML:
GALAXIA - the space arcade game for Android Wear! Use your wrist to control the game!

After successfully defeated the aliens on the moon, you are now going to face the complete alien fleets in space!

GAME DESCRIPTION
• Tap to move the spaceship and fire, or control with the wrist!
• Tap on TAP/WRIST CONTROL in title screen to select control mode.
• Spaceship can takes 2 extra hits before destroyed.
• Some aliens can take 1 or 2 extra hits before destroyed.
• Enjoy sound effects on Huawei Watch and other watches with speakers!
comments: The tap control didn't work well but the motion one works great.
Easily the best game for Android Wear I've encountered yet.  The wrist motion control is fantastic!
Fun The game is quite basic, but that's actually a benefit and not a fault. There is no other Android Wear game worth installing IMO.
Great game. Well done. Would be good with sound from the new watches with built in speaker's on next update
Ita not downloading to my gear s2? I open the app and check my apps but i dont see it?
recentChanges: Improved game play, now more challenging!
